entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Comox Airport 7:00 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 7.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: 2.0°C

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3 except zero inland. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. 30 percent chance of wet flurries inland overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low plus 3 except zero inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023
